name: Nights at Mr Steven's Restaurant
description:
Story:

Your stepfather asks you to go to the factory that created the Rexy the wolf and Barney  the bear robots to work!

You are hired as a technician and your job is to repair and troubleshoot the robots that are brought to the factory every Tuesday.

We hope you do the right thing because we don't want the robots break down when we turn them on in the restaurant!

Warning !

This game has jumpscarers and scenes containing blood and is not recommended for people under 14 years old.

dev's note:

We started making this game with about 15 people in the spring of 2021, but unfortunately, due to restrictions and financial flows (90% of game assets and all characters are made by us), it was reduced to 5 people after a while ... We didn't want to publish this for money,  but we need the facilities to make better and higher quality games, thanks for the support <3 :)
